tasks.title: MoE Learning System: Master cortex Architecture and Operations

context.description: Comprehensive learning task for MoE system to deeply understand cortex architecture, workflows, agents, security patterns, development standards, and operational intelligence

architecture_mastery.description: Deep understanding of cortex system architecture
areas: MoE (Mixture of Experts) routing and coordination patterns
Master agent specializations (development, security, inventory, cicd, coordinator)
Worker pool management and lifecycle (spawn, activate, heartbeat, cleanup)
Task queue architecture and multi-lane routing strategies
Process manager (PM) architecture and daemon orchestration
Dashboard real-time monitoring and SSE streaming architecture
Health monitoring, alerts, and governance systems
Vector database and semantic search capabilities
learning_methods: Study master agent implementations in coordination/masters/

workflow_intelligence.description: Understanding of operational workflows and decision-making patterns
areas: Task routing decision trees and confidence scoring
Worker activation strategies (single, sparse pool, full pool)
Task lifecycle management (pending → assigned → in_progress → completed)
learning_methods: Review task queue patterns in coordination/task-queue.json

agent_specialization.description: Deep knowledge of each master agent's capabilities and patterns

common_patterns: JSONL file formats for state persistence

learning_methods: Analyze historical task patterns by expert in task-patterns.json
Study successful task completions and routing decisions
Examine master agent specifications and capabilities

security_intelligence.description: Understanding of security patterns, risks, and mitigation strategies
areas: Common vulnerability patterns and CVE classifications
learning_methods: Study governance audit logs in coordination/governance-audit.jsonl
Analyze security scan results and remediation patterns

development_standards.description: Understanding of coding standards, patterns, and best practices
learning_methods: Study existing implementations in scripts/, dashboard/, coordination/
Review recent commits and development patterns

operational_intelligence.description: Real-time system behavior and performance patterns
learning_methods: Study PM activity logs in coordination/pm-activity.jsonl

latest_developments.description: Stay current with recent builds, features, and improvements
learning_methods: Analyze recent git commits and commit messages

learning_deliverables.name: enhanced_task_patterns
learning_deliverables.description: Enhanced patterns with architectural understanding, workflow knowledge, and agent specialization insights

learning_deliverables.name: routing_intelligence_model
learning_deliverables.description: Advanced routing decision model based on architecture, context, complexity, and historical patterns

learning_deliverables.name: agent_capability_matrix
learning_deliverables.description: Detailed matrix of each agent's strengths, patterns, and optimal use cases

learning_deliverables.name: security_pattern_library
learning_deliverables.description: Library of security patterns, vulnerabilities, and remediation strategies

learning_deliverables.name: development_standards_guide
learning_deliverables.description: Codified development standards, patterns, and best practices

learning_deliverables.name: operational_insights
learning_deliverables.description: Real-time behavioral patterns, performance baselines, and optimization opportunities

learning_deliverables.name: learning_summary_report
learning_deliverables.description: Comprehensive report documenting learned knowledge, insights, and recommendations

activities: Read and analyze all architecture documentation
Map agent capabilities to task types
Study health monitoring and alerting flows
Document decision trees and branching logic

success_criteria: All 7 learning deliverables created with comprehensive data
Routing intelligence model shows improved confidence scoring
Agent capability matrix covers all 5 master agents
Security pattern library contains at least 20 patterns
Development standards guide documents key conventions
Learning report demonstrates deep system understanding
Enhanced task patterns show architectural awareness
MoE routing accuracy improvement measurable in next 10 tasks

tasks.cancellation_reason: User requested focus on routing intelligence only
